SELECT tree.* FROM ${tableName} tree WHERE #{nodeId} = tree.node_id
AND #{lft} <= tree.lft

SELECT tree.* FROM ${tableName} tree WHERE #{nodeId} = tree.node_id
AND #{rgt} < tree.rgt

SELECT tag.* FROM ${tableName} tree WHERE #{nodeId} = tree.node_id

SELECT tag.* FROM ${tableName} tree WHERE #{nodeId} = tree.node_id AND #{child.lft} <= tree.lft AND tree.rgt <= #{child.rgt}
